kv2.3:5.3: Atthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:6.1: Natthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:6.3: Hañci natthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:7.1: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, atthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:7.3: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, atthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:8.1: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, natthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:8.3: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, natthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:9.3: Atthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā, saṃghe kaṅkhā, sikkhāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:10.1: Natthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā … pe …
kv2.3:10.5: Hañci natthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā … pe …
kv2.3:10.7: idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:11.1: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, atthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā … pe …
kv2.3:11.5: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, atthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā … pe …
kv2.3:12.1: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, natthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā … pe …
kv2.3:12.5: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, natthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā … pe …
kv2.3:13.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.3:13.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:14.18: nanu arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.3:14.22: Hañci arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.3:14.24: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:15.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi kaṅkhā, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi kaṅkhāti.
kv2.3:17.1: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:17.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:18.19: sadhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.3:18.23: Paradhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.3:18.28: paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:18.30: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:19.19: paradhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.3:19.23: Sadhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.3:20.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.3:20.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
kv2.3:20.9: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.3:21.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.3:21.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
kv2.3:21.8: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
kv2.3:21.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.3:22.4: “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
kv2.3:22.5: sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.3:24.4: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
kv2.3:24.5: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.3:29.1: Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vā,
kv2.3:31.2: Na tattha kiṃ kaṅkhati koci sāvako;
kv2.3:33.4: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāme kaṅkheyyāti?
kv2.3:33.6: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāme kaṅkheyya;
kv2.3:34.1: Arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāme kaṅkheyyāti, atthi arahato kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:34.3: Arahā sotāpattiphale vā sakadāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arahatte vā kaṅkheyyāti?
